DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to assess a compact, portable, wireless movement disorder system with continuous monitoring capabilities to detect and quantify the severity of levodopa-induced dyskinesia in Parkinson's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Ambulatory Parkinson's Disease Dyskinesia Monitor for Drug Therapy Titration
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease Clinical history of levodopainduced dyskinesia 21 Years of age or older Stage 2 4 OFFmedication on the Hoehn and Yahr scale Dementia (determined by a neuropsychological assessment) Severe tremor unaffected by levodopa
